casebody.data:
Melvin THOMAS, et ux., petitioners,
v.
Tranzie LOVELESS, et ux. No. 14-8763. Supreme Court of the United States May 4, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari Court of Civil Appeals of Alabama dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
